name: Ben 10: Omniverse 2
overview: Ben 10: Omniverse 2 is a video game based on the American animated series of the same name and is the sequel to Ben 10: Omniverse. The game was published by D3 Publisher on November 2013 for PlayStation 3, Xbox 360, Nintendo DS, Wii, Nintendo 3DS and Wii U. The game received extremely negative reviews during release.
